data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Lago Nicaragua, Nicaragua to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lago Nicaragua, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Lago Nicaragua, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 107,436 believers in the state of Lago Nicaragua to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, remind your church in Lago Nicaragua that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Lago Nicaragua. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Lago Nicaragua.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lago Nicaragua, Nicaragua has a population of 250,300.

We estimate Lago Nicaragua has 107,436 people who might know Jesus, 133,300 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 9,564 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Lago Nicaragua with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
